text: yaad karo jab inakaar karanevaale logon ne apane dilon mein hath ko jagah dee, agyaanapoorn hath ko; to allaah ne apane rasool par aur eemaanavaalo par sakeena (prashaanti) utaaree aur unhen parahezagaaree (dharmaparaayanata) kee baat ka paaband rakha. ve isake zyaada haqadaar aur isake yogy bhee the. allaah to har cheez jaanata hai
